title: The Bright land
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, distributor

description: This tour of the islands in the West Indies Federation looks at the various resources of the islands, including sugar, coffee, bananas, oil, and bauxite. Good contrast between the beauty of the landscape and life on the land, with the moderninity of city life.
